segments.text: This kitchen is a mess, and no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is everywhere, and that woman just keeps drying her dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like she's in a trance or something, not noticing the chaos around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are being so naughty, and she's completely clueless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand seeing this kind of neglect; someone needs to step in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is going to be ruined with all that water just sitting there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those cabinets are getting soaked; they'll be warped in no time.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just can't believe how careless everyone is being right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman should really pay more attention to what's going on around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like she's in her own little bubble, and nothing else matters.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could just leave, but I feel like I have to do something about this.
segments.speaker: PAR
